---
name: Typography
route: /typography
menu: Utilities
order: 1000
---

import { Playground } from "docz"
import { Box, ConfigConsumer } from "../../dist/benefit.js"
import InfoBox from "../components/InfoBox"
import Grid from "../components/Grid"
import ConfigPropertyList from "../components/ConfigPropertyList"

# Typography

## Text Color

`text-{color}`

<Playground>
  <Box className="text-purple-500">
    Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
  </Box>
</Playground>

## Font Family

`font-{family}`

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid>
      {Object.keys(config.theme.fontFamily).map((fontClass) => (
        <InfoBox key={`font-${fontClass}`} pattern={`font-${fontClass}`}>
          <Box>
            <Box className={`bg-white p-2 rounded font-${fontClass}`}>
              Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
            </Box>
            <Box className="flex flex-wrap pt-2">
              {config.theme.fontFamily[fontClass].map((typeface) => (
                <Box className="bg-white shadow px-3 py-1 text-xs font-mono rounded mr-2 mb-2">
                  {typeface}
                </Box>
              ))}
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  )}
</ConfigConsumer>

<Playground>
  <Box is="p" className="font-serif">
    Organic swag selvage, snackwave gochujang messenger bag asymmetrical
    gastropub gluten-free whatever lumbersexual. Fanny pack 3 wolf moon etsy,
    offal flannel ethical schlitz franzen. Unicorn try-hard bicycle rights tbh
    vegan yr. Whatever waistcoat bitters hammock paleo 3 wolf moon photo booth
    marfa vape fixie. Prism mumblecore neutra, hell of tote bag before they sold
    out succulents deep v freegan yr swag.
  </Box>
</Playground>

## Font Size

<ConfigPropertyList property="fontSize" pattern="text-{size}" />

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid minWidth="6rem">
      {Object.keys(config.theme.fontSize).map((size) => (
        <InfoBox key={`text-${size}`} pattern={`text-${size}`}>
          <Box
            className={`bg-white rounded h-24 flex justify-center items-center text-${size}`}
          >
            Aa
          </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  )}
</ConfigConsumer>

## Font Weight

<ConfigPropertyList property="fontWeight" />

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid>
      {Object.keys(config.theme.fontWeight).map((weight) => (
        <InfoBox key={`font-${weight}`} pattern={`font-${weight}`}>
          <Box className={`bg-white p-2 font-sans font-${weight}`}>
            Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
          </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  )}
</ConfigConsumer>

## Letter Spacing

<ConfigPropertyList property="letterSpacing" pattern="tracking-{size}" />

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid>
      {Object.keys(config.theme.letterSpacing).map((size) => (
        <InfoBox key={`tracking-${size}`} pattern={`tracking-${size}`}>
          <Box className={`bg-white p-2 font-sans tracking-${size}`}>
            Pack my box with five dozen liquor jugs.
          </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  )}
</ConfigConsumer>

## Line Height

<ConfigPropertyList property="lineHeight" pattern="leading-{size}" />

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid>
      {Object.keys(config.theme.lineHeight).map((size) => (
        <InfoBox key={`leading-${size}`} pattern={`leading-${size}`}>
          <Box className={`bg-white p-2 font-sans leading-${size}`}>
        Portland flannel trust fund plaid kitsch. Hot chicken everyday carry williamsburg YOLO green juice lomo. Bicycle rights man bun +1 shabby chic migas salvia listicle polaroid paleo.
        </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>

)}

</ConfigConsumer>

## Lists

List Style Type

`list-{type}`

<ConfigPropertyList property="listStyleType" />

<ConfigConsumer>
  {({ config }) => (
    <Grid minWidth="200px">
      {Object.keys(config.theme.listStyleType).map((type) => (
        <InfoBox key={`list-${type}`} pattern={`list-${type}`}>
          <Box
            className={`bg-white rounded p-2 ${
              type !== "none" ? "pl-6" : ""
            } text-sm`}
          >
            <Box is="ul" className={`list-${type}`}>
              <Box is="li" className="bg-gray-200 rounded-sm h-5 mb-2" />
              <Box is="li" className="bg-gray-200 rounded-sm h-5 w-1/2 mb-2" />
              <Box is="li" className="bg-gray-200 rounded-sm h-5 w-2/3" />
            </Box>
          </Box>
        </InfoBox>
      ))}
    </Grid>
  )}
</ConfigConsumer>

List Style Position

`list-{inside|outside}`

<Playground>
  <Box is="ul" className="list-square list-outside">
    <Box is="li">
      Pitchfork austin readymade copper mug plaid activated charcoal
    </Box>
    <Box is="li">
      Godard tacos you probably haven't heard of them, offal poutine hashtag
      leggings
    </Box>
    <Box is="li">
      Locavore lumbersexual slow-carb franzen tbh letterpress cred PBR&B flannel
      cornhole typewriter hexagon listicle.
    </Box>
  </Box>
</Playground>

## Style, Decoration, and Aliasing

Text Style

<Grid minWidth="200px">
  <InfoBox pattern="italic">
    <Box className="italic p-2 rounded bg-white">Italic</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="not-italic">
    <Box className="not-italic p-2 rounded bg-white">Not Italic</Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

Text Transform

<Grid minWidth="200px">
  <InfoBox pattern="uppercase">
    <Box className="uppercase p-2 rounded bg-white">Uppercase</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="lowercase">
    <Box className="lowercase p-2 rounded bg-white">Lowercase</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="capitalize">
    <Box className="capitalize p-2 rounded bg-white">Capitalize</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="normal-case">
    <Box className="normal-case p-2 rounded bg-white">Normal Case</Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

Text Decoration

<Grid minWidth="200px">
  <InfoBox pattern="underline">
    <Box className="underline p-2 rounded bg-white">Underline</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="line-through">
    <Box className="line-through p-2 rounded bg-white">Line Through</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="no-underline">
    <Box className="no-underline p-2 rounded bg-white">No Underline</Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

Text Aliasing

<Grid minWidth="200px">
  <InfoBox pattern="antialiased">
    <Box className="antialiased p-2 rounded bg-white">Antialiased</Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="subpixel-antialiased">
    <Box className="subpixel-antialiased p-2 rounded bg-white">
      Subpixel Antialiased
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

## Alignment

<Grid minWidth="200px" className="text-sm">
  <InfoBox pattern="text-left">
    <Box className="text-left p-2 rounded bg-white">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.{" "}
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="text-right">
    <Box className="text-right p-2 rounded bg-white">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.{" "}
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="text-center">
    <Box className="text-center p-2 rounded bg-white">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.{" "}
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="text-justify">
    <Box className="text-justify p-2 rounded bg-white">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.{" "}
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

## Vertical Alignment

<Grid minWidth="200px" className="text-sm">
  <InfoBox pattern="align-baseline">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-baseline w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="align-top">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-top w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="align-middle">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-middle w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="align-bottom">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-bottom w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="align-text-top">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-text-top w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="align-text-bottom">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white ">
      An example of a box:
      <Box
        is="img"
        src="data:image/svg+xml;base64,"
        className="align-text-bottom w-12 ml-2 bg-gray-200 rounded-full p-2"
      />
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

## Whitespace

<Grid minWidth="200px" className="text-sm">
  <InfoBox pattern="break-normal">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white break-normal">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="break-words">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white break-words">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="break-all">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white break-all">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="truncate">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white truncate">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>

<Grid minWidth="200px" className="text-sm">
  <InfoBox pattern="whitespace-normal">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white whitespace-normal">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="whitespace-no-wrap">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white whitespace-no-wrap">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="whitespace-pre">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white whitespace-pre">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="whitespace-pre-line">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white truncate whitespace-pre-line">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
  <InfoBox pattern="whitespace-pre-wrap">
    <Box className="p-2 rounded bg-white truncate whitespace-pre-wrap">
      Hoodie waistcoat mlkshk keytar sustainable, everyday carry tofu squid
      aesthetic twee tumeric next level hell of heirloom.
    </Box>
  </InfoBox>
</Grid>
